title: NZGC Last Chance Recruitment - Diamond 1 +
body: (Edited) The team is currently in need of a mid laner to complete the roster! Will consider anyone d5 and above. We will be competing in this weekends qualifier.

replies.body: BTW I know some lower diamond people added me a couple weeks ago and I had given up on making a team. My motivation is back so add me again please! In need of a mid lane. Support and top could be considered too.
